details: C programming is a widely-used and versatile programming language that has been in existence for several decades.
Algorithms are fundamental to computer science and play a critical role in solving a wide range of problems efficiently and effectively.
C++ is a powerful and versatile programming language that is commonly used for Data Structures and Algorithms (DSA).
Data structures are fundamental components in computer science and programming.
Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) is a programming paradigm that focuses on organizing code into objects, which are instances of classes.
Software engineering is a discipline within computer science and technology that focuses on the systematic and organized development of software systems.
AWS is one of the world's leading cloud computing platforms, offering a wide range of cloud services and solutions to individuals, businesses, and organizations.

MySQL is an open-source relational database management system (RDBMS) that is widely used for building and managing databases in various applications, ranging from small websites to large enterprise systems.
Problem-solving is a fundamental skill in computer science, software engineering, and many other fields. It involves systematically approaching and solving complex problems.
